other_tests.findings: Blood-tinged secretions flowing from all the bronchial orifices.
Dark, congested phlegmonous consolidation of the right upper lobe and firm, blood-filled areas in the right middle and right lower lobes.
Solidification by a cellular infiltrate and hemorrhage; presence of microabscesses and palisading granuloma indicative of Wegenerâ€™s granulomatosis.
